text: Penia nganyoa lilobe likolongwa kuboka kumbengu lyakalenga, â€œNgoe Nnoongo bakombwile bandu bakwe! Na Nnoongo nngwana jwito alaite makakala ni kingwana cha Kilisto Nkomboi jwampambwile alaya kinala chakwe. Magambu jwajo ojubatakiana akalongo bito nnongi ja Nnoongo kilo na mui, alekeligwe pae.
